title: Madhabi Puri: Woman, finance professional and non-IAS has tough challenges ahead at SEBI - CNBCTV18
content: Madhabi Puri: Woman, finance professional and non-IAS has tough challenges ahead at SEBI  CNBCTV18
description: Madhabi Puri Buch has secured the SEBI chairperson's job, a post which the IAS would be unhappy to lose. Hopefully she will remain persuasive enough to secure the co-operation of the bureaucracy when needed.
